TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Status extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents the result of a WS-Trust Validation request.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Represents the contents of the wst:Status element. This required element contains the result of a WS-Trust Validation request.
For more information about the element that this class represents, see the version of the WS-Trust specification that applies to your scenario.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string code, string reason) cil managed
Public Sub New (code As String, reason As String)

Docs.param: A string that contains the status code URI.
A string that contains a human-readable reason. The reason is optional; can be .
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified status code and reason.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Code { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Code : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the status code for the WS-Trust Validation binding in the RSTR.
Docs.value: A string that contains a status code URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Represents the contents of the wst:Code element. This required element contains a URI that indicates the status of the Validation request.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Reason { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Reason : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the optional status reason for the WS-Trust Validation binding in the RSTR.
Docs.value: A string that contains the reason.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Represents the contents of a wst:Reason element. This optional element contains a human-readable reason that relates to the status code.
